meta_description: The Leahy Library is is closed from December 25th, 2025 through January 31st, 2026.
admission_text:
Support the Vermont Historical Society and join today. Click below to choose the membership level that suits your household, business, or organization.

### [Join or renew today Support VHS as a member ](https://vermonthistoricalsociety.membership.veevartapp.com/) [__](https://vermonthistoricalsociety.membership.veevartapp.com/)

### [Member Resources Exclusive access to certain VHS programs and content ](member-resources) [__](member-resources)

### [Institutional membership For local historical societies, libraries, museums, and other institutions ](https://vermonthistoricalsociety.membership.veevartapp.com/membership/view/join/institutional?corporate=true) [__](https://vermonthistoricalsociety.membership.veevartapp.com/membership/view/join/institutional?corporate=true)

### Membership Benefits

_All members receive:_

  * Unlimited free admission to the Museum, History Center, and Leahy Library
  * 15% discount at the museum store and online
  * Discounts on programs and workshops
  * Subscription to semi-annual Vermont History journal and History Connections newsletter
  * Voting privileges at the Annual Meeting
  * Invitations to members-only events

_These membership levels also include:_

  * Associate: North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) membership and four guest passes.
  * Sustaining: NARM membership, six guest passes, and one gift membership.
  * Principal: NARM membership, twelve guest passes, and two gift memberships.
  * Preservationist, Ambassador, Stewards...
